content: **savannah desert scarf** get ready to crochet a piece that brings the warm hues and textures of the desert right into your wardrobe the savannah desert scarf is a versatile and stylish accessory crocheted in cool cotton perfect for your summer wardrobe **buy any 2 patterns for 30% off** this scarf is perfect for adding a touch of handmade charm to your outfit whether you re heading out for a casual day or dressing up for an evening out the savannah desert scarf complements any style the pattern includes step-by-step instructions to guide you through the process
